Description:

Take the command of the most powerful army the ancient world , turn their country into a great empire and make your enemies bow to the military, economic and political power . Of course , some will admire your progress , while others will be envious , it is possible that among the last will and your closest associates . Will the traitors pay you a stab in the back , or the first to oppose the old friends ? How many of you are willing to sacrifice for the sake of Rome became exactly the way you want it to be? Took the title of Emperor , will you defend the republic , or turn into a brutal dictator ?

Features: 

The creators of the celebrated series Total War again represent a strategic game , designed to the smallest detail, in which step by step gameplay blends with battles in real time .
Conquer all the states of the Ancient World in a larger campaign .
Take command of thousands of Roman army and lead it to victory in the great battles of antiquity.
Enjoy exotic views of majestic ancient cities , recreated on screen in the smallest details , and bloody , but at the same time excellent battle scenes , when on the battlefield converge colossal armies . With our new camera control you can follow what is happening with the most favorable angles.
Rate optimization magnificent game - Total War: Rome 2 works fine on stationary home computers, laptops and compact .
